Born: Jorge Francisco Isidoro Luis Borges Acevedo ( 1899-08-24 ) 24 August 1899 Buenos Aires ,  Argentina
Occupation: Writer, poet, philosopher, translator, editor, critic, librarian
NotableWorks: A Universal History of Infamy  (1935) Ficciones  (1944) El Aleph  (1949) Labyrinths  (1962) The Book of Sand  (1975)
Relatives: Leonor Acevedo  (mother) Jorge Guillermo Borges  (father) Norah Borges  (sister) Guillermo de Torre  (brother-in-law) Francisco Borges  (grandfather) Manuel Isidoro Surez  (great-grandfather)
